title: VR-Based Art Appreciation Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary art history and art appreciation terminology
context.additional_context: VR-based art appreciation education provided in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones, with asynchronous learning design that considers time efficiency for working learners.

learning_goals: Learners analyze and explain the historical context and artistic characteristics of major artworks in a VR environment.
Learners compare interconnectedness among artworks using virtual gallery navigation and enhance critical appreciation skills.
Learners visually document artwork interpretation processes and create reflective portfolios incorporating feedback via VR-based interactive tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
